name: Rhythm Gallery
description:
Rhythm Gallery is a highly customizable shooting game about shooting targets to the indicated rhythm. Shoot targets using either left click or right click. A successful hit will result in a note being played, while off-beat hits will result in a quack. You can set the tempo, as well as the rhythms being spawned.

Supports mouse only.

Notable issues:

-First few duck spawns are buggy, with some targets overlapping and some being invincible

-Downbeats seem to be harder to hit than other notes, or maybe I'm just bad
